rules:
Type `,play` in chat and the bot will play a random kpop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first person to guess the song name in chat. See your current game options with `,options`. Use `,help [command]` to get more details about a command.
[Click here to join the official KMQ server for more help.](https://discord.gg/RCuzwYV)
[Click here to see more details about how to play.](https://brainicism.github.io/KMQ_Discord/GAMEPLAY)
[Click here to see frequently asked questions.](https://brainicism.github.io/KMQ_Discord/FAQ)
